project: TYLT VÜ Pulse for Pebble Time™
details: Seamlessly turn your Pebble Time into a true fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring & enjoy the simplicity of Qi Wireless Charging!

project: BULLET | World's Smallest LED Flashlight
details: Functional, Minimal, and Refined EDC. BULLET light is more than just a tiny flashlight, it is the next step in mini everyday carry.

project: Pagaré NFC Payment Smartstraps for Pebble Smartwatches
details: The coolest, easiest way to pay at millions of retailers using your Pebble smartwatch. Leave the phone behind. Just tap and go!

project: The world's smartest photo storage and management device.
details: Monument stores and automatically organizes your photos by time, location, faces and what's in them. End your photo mess!

project: Sense: Personalized Intelligence for your Connected Home
details: A beautifully designed, responsive, intelligent, and secure assistant. The eyes, ears, and brain of your modern household.

project: Rocketbook Wave: Cloud Connected Microwavable Notebook
details: Combine the freedom of pen and paper with the utility of the cloud. Microwave. Repeat.

project: Nurugo Micro : The Smallest 400x Microscope for Smartphone
details: Nurugo Micro is the smallest and lightest digital microscope with 400x magnification and high resolution.

project: The Disaster Prediction App
details: The Disaster App can send notifications of high-risk times for earthquakes, tropical storms, and solar storms.

project: DreamScreen - Smart LED backlighting for any HDMI TV!
details: DreamScreen enhances TV, Movies, & Video Games by stretching the size, softening the picture and making TV easier on your eyes.

project: LoPy – the LoRa, WiFi and Bluetooth IoT development platform
details: LoPy is a MicroPython triple-network dev platform which doubles up as a LoRa Nano gateway. Arduino IDE compatible as stretch goal.

project: qooMeter: Finally a Smart USB Cable/Charger Tester for Dummy
details: The first ever, an easy and intuitive way to find out the quality of USB cables & chargers in a glance, especially for non-tech people.

project: CableKnife - The World's best cable insulation stripper
details: CableKnife is the best solution for removing insulation from cables for the purpose of maximising the scrap metal value by up to 350%

project: Complete course: Build Kickstarter with Python and Bootstrap
details: Complete projects to learn how to code by building Kickstarter, Instagram & more from zero to launch

project: PenSe. A Pencil case.
details: PenSe: The simple and effective case for your Apple Pencil.

project: Stikk- The Gel Pad That Will Stick Anything to Everything!
details: Stikk is a Unique Re-Usable Double Sided Gel Pad That Will Stick Anything to Everything!

project: SENTIO - World’s first open & closed headphone
details: Worlds first open and closed back headphone all in one. Be part of the revolution with Rock Jaw Audio.

project: HOT Band: The Smart Watch Band for Any Watch
details: Now, you can make phone calls with Pebble watch, experience private calls with Apple watch, or make ANY fashion watch a smartwatch.

project: LUX CABLES | The Premium Charging Cable
details: 2 meters long, thicker wire gauge (20 AWG), metal encased tips and braided with nylon. MFI certified and Quick Charge compatible.

project: PACE - Mach dein Auto zum Smartcar!
details: PACE verbindet dein Auto mit deinem Handy und macht Autofahren sicherer, stressfreier & günstiger || PACE turns your car in a smartcar!

project: OpenKey - The Two-factor Authentication & Password Solution
details: Finally, a simple solution to the password and two-factor authentication problem.
